title: Gamification-Based Mathematics Competency Enhancement Course: Leaderboard-Driven Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Arithmetic Computation Skills and Experience Solving Work-Related Mathematical Problems
context.additional_context: Practical mathematics concepts applicable to workplace tasks for working professionals, integrated with a digital leaderboard system in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can solve work-scenario-based mathematical problems with 80% accuracy.
Learners can enhance their learning motivation by 20% through interaction with peer learners using a leaderboard system.

Learners design at least three mathematical problem-solving strategies through gamified project assignments (quests, reward systems) and submit deliverables achieving over 80% completion rates in peer evaluations and instructor feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
